description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à North Malé Atoll, Maldives. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Maldives Five-Star Boutique Island Paradise with PADI Dive Centre & Ranamaari Shipwreck
hotels.description: Dive into luxury with a five-star villa stay at the boutique Dhawa Ihuru, a flawless slice of paradise in the Maldives’ North Malé Atoll. Boasting one of the clearest house reefs in the archipelago - containing the famed Ranamaari shipwreck - and an onsite PADI Dive Centre, it’s the perfect gateway to the wonders of the atoll’s prismatic underwater kingdoms. Enjoy alfresco dining at the beachfront restaurant or head to Angsana Spa Ihuru for enchanting treatments under swaying palms.

hotels.title: Luxurious Maldives Retreat with World's Largest Overwater Villa on Private Island
hotels.description: Slow down, breathe deeply and immerse yourself in the epitome of barefoot island luxury at the enchanting Gili Lankanfushi Maldives resort, home to the world’s largest overwater villa, in the stunning North Malé Atoll. This private island sanctuary is the ultimate island escape where every moment is met with the breathtaking backdrop of unbelievably clear turquoise waters, blue skies, towering palm trees and silky-white sand. Treat your senses to a sophisticated oceanfront meal of Japanese-fusion flavours at By The Sea restaurant, or venture through the nightly market-style dining at Kashiveli restaurant, showcasing the best of local produce.

seo.title: Hôtels à North Malé Atoll - Maldives Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à North Malé Atoll, Maldives avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
